message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $95. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  How about we split the difference and settle at $90?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $82.50.
Bob, it seems like we both see the value in this product.  I'm willing to come down to $87.50, my final offer.  This is a great deal!
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80.
